title: Handle a Vehicle Breakdown
description: A driver reports that their truck has broken down on the highway. A fleet manager must arrange for a tow and repair.

tasks.description: Receive a call from the driver about the breakdown, including their location and the nature of the issue.
Find the nearest approved service provider using a vendor search tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a qualified repair shop within 20 miles.

tasks.description: Arrange for a tow truck to take the vehicle to the selected repair shop.
tasks.expected_outcome: A tow is dispatched to the driver's location.

tasks.description: Create a new repair order in the system to track the status and cost of the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new repair order is created and linked to the truck.
